ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.details: Note if msg.value is larger than the required fee (from getFee) we accept the overpayment with no refund.

params.message: The cross-chain CCIP message including data and/or tokens
The cross-chain CCIP message including data and/or tokens

returns.fee: returns guaranteed execution fee for the specified message delivery to destination chain

returns.tokens: The addresses of all tokens that are supported.

returns.supported: is true if it is supported, false if not.

ccipSend(uint64,(bytes,bytes,(address,ui.notice: Request a message to be sent to the destination chain

getSupportedTokens(uint64).notice: Gets a list of all supported tokens which can be sent or received to/from a given chain id.

isChainSupported(uint64).notice: Checks if the given chain ID is supported for sending/receiving.
